SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDCOUNT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the number of children associated with an interaction
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDCOUNT( @interactionID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns int with execute as caller as begin declare @childCount int = 0 select @childCount = count(SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID) from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONCHILDREN where INTERACTIONID=@interactionID
return @childCount end
